dict.acceptation: 旅行，观光；巡回演出；任职期；轮班；

sent.orig: We also provide tour guide service, including Buddhism tour, restaurant tour, shopping tour and suburb tour.
sent.trans: 我们还提供导游服务，包括佛教旅游，餐饮旅游，购物旅游和近郊旅游。

sent.orig: Tour operator is offering tour at half price of half-price tour to people make last-minute bookings.
sent.trans: 旅游经营者推出半价旅游以便在行程开始前最后再招揽一些客人。

sent.orig: With the expand requirement of tour market to zoology tour. Zoology tour grows quite rapidly aera.
sent.trans: 随着旅游市场对需求的扩大，生态旅游发展十分迅速。

sent.orig: It majors in in-bound tour bound tour, domestic tour as well as air and train ticketing.
sent.trans: 主营入境旅游、出境旅游、国内旅游业务，代售机票、火车票。

sent.orig: Pacifica tour is look for a bilingual tour guide for escort tour group through san francisco.
sent.trans: 柏西菲卡旅游公司正在寻找陪同旅游团浏览旧金山的双语导游。
